javax.microedition.media
类 VideoCaptureControl

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.media.VideoCaptureControl
所有已实现的接口：
Control, GUIControl, VideoControl
public class VideoCaptureControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements VideoControl

Simulation video capture control that simulates capturing video within microemu

作者：
Rainer Burgstaller

字段摘要
 
从接口 javax.microedition.media.control.VideoControl 继承的字段
USE_DIRECT_VIDEO
 
从接口 javax.microedition.media.control.GUIControl 继承的字段
USE_GUI_PRIMITIVE

构造方法详细信息

VideoCaptureControl

public VideoCaptureControl(Player player,
                           java.lang.String locator)
creates a capture control.

参数：
player - the player object
locator - the locator that was used when creating the player.
